heading: Core Values
subheading: Three key values shape the identity and authentic Japanese experience in every dish and service.
note: These principles guide all activities and commitments of Sushi Takumi.
quote: These core values are not only the compass for business operations but also our promise to each diner.
values_0: {"title":"Quality","desc":"Fresh ingredients and authentic Japanese techniques.","detail":"We commit to using fresh, carefully selected ingredients from reputable suppliers, combined with traditional Japanese techniques to bring you a premium culinary experience.","icon":"Award","stats":"100%","statsLabel":"Freshness"}
values_1: {"title":"Respect","desc":"Treat customers as honored guests in Japanese culture.","detail":"We always put customers first, providing thoughtful, courteous service that reflects the spirit of Japanese hospitality.","icon":"Heart","stats":"4.9★","statsLabel":"Ratings"}
values_2: {"title":"Creativity","desc":"Innovating the menu while preserving sushi traditions.","detail":"We continuously innovate to refresh our menu with unique ingredients, offering diverse culinary experiences while preserving traditional values.","icon":"Lightbulb","stats":"50+","statsLabel":"Special dishes"}
